org.asoem.greyfish.core.agent

Interface Agent<C extends Context<?,?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - The type of the simulation context
    All Superinterfaces:
    AgentNode, java.lang.Runnable, org.asoem.greyfish.utils.collect.TreeNode<AgentNode>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Basic2DAgent, BasicAgent, SpatialAgent<A,C,P,AC>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAgent, AbstractSpatialAgent, DefaultBasic2DAgent, DefaultBasicAgent

    public interface Agent<C extends Context<?,?>>
extends AgentNode, java.lang.Runnable
    An Agent which is the basic unit of a DiscreteTimeEnvironment.

        valueType - the class of the trait value
